command_responses.sr_disabled_message: @{author_name} - Sorry, song requests are currently unavailable for non-subscribers.
command_responses.sr_globally_disabled_message: @{author_name} - Song requests are currently disabled by the streamer.
command_responses.sr_no_args_message: @{author_name} - Please use format: !sr songname by artistname OR !sr songname - artistname
command_responses.sr_invalid_format_message: @{author_name} - Invalid format! Use: !sr songname by artistname OR !sr songname - artistname
command_responses.remove_no_pending_message: @{author_name} - No pending song requests found to remove!
command_responses.edit_no_args_message: @{author_name} - Please use format: !edit songname by artistname OR !edit songname - artistname
command_responses.edit_invalid_format_message: @{author_name} - Invalid edit format! Use: !edit songname by artistname OR !edit songname - artistname
command_responses.edit_success_message: @{author_name} - Your request for '{old_song}' by {old_artist} has been updated to '{new_song}' by {new_artist}!
command_responses.edit_no_pending_message: @{author_name} - You have no pending song requests to edit.
command_responses.current_no_songs_message: The song queue is currently empty!
command_responses.pos_no_pending_message: @{author_name} - You have no pending song requests in the queue.
command_responses.pos_message: @{author_name} - Your top request '{song}' by {artist} is currently #{position} in the queue.
command_responses.skip_success_message: @{author_name} - Your request for '{song}' by {artist} has been skipped!
command_responses.skip_no_pending_message: @{author_name} - You have no pending song requests to skip.
